headline: Two Reasons Why VRSN is Risky and One Stock to Buy Instead
summary: VeriSign trades at $194.92 per share and has stayed right on track with the overall market, gaining 9.4% over the last six months. At the same time, the S&P 500 has returned 10.3%.
